title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with a red truck in the distance.
caption: A red car drives down a city street with a red truck in the distance.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a one-way street with tall buildings on both sides. There are several cars and a red truck driving in the opposite direction. The weather is clear and sunny. The traffic light is green.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed and following the red truck in the distance. It slows down and brakes frequently to maintain a safe distance from other vehicles. The driver is cautious and pays attention to the traffic light and pedestrians crossing the street.
